name: Attached
detailed_description:
Please keep in mind that game is in early access state. You can test it later if you do not want to see bugs, missing features and contents. We are working hard to improve it. You can realise it with frequency of the updates. However it will take some time to finish development process. If you are okay with it you can enjoy with evolution of the game.

Attached is a 3D multiplayer survival game. You can build your kingdom with your friends or own yourself. But be careful other players can destroy your progress, eliminate them and be the one.

Magic was an active force all over the kingdom. People used it to heal their wounds, fight against their enemies. However world is changing, Something started to spread called "Technology". Some people call it devil and others try to assimilate it. What do you believe Magic Or Tech?

short_description: Magic was an active force all over the kingdom. People used it to heal their wounds, fight against their enemies. However world is changing, Something started to spread called "Technology". Some people call it devil and others try to assimilate it. What do you believe Magic Or Tech?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
